long_description: The MSR Zing shelter is ideal for multi-night basecamp endeavors and sleeps 6 - 12 adults. It easily covers a large picnic-table-size area to shield you from sun, rain and even wind. 2 included poles and the option to add a third leave you with numerous configuration possbilities ranging from maximum protection to maximum space. Ultralight fabrics create 200 sq. ft. of coverage at a weight and size you can carry anywhere. Tight-pitching wing design and small packed size make this shelter at home in the backcountry, too. Ultralight and taped DuraShield(TM)-coated silnylon offers waterproof protection for the long haul. 2 double-tapered aluminum poles with reinforced mid-sections offer excellent strength while keeping weight to a minimum. Use just the 2 included poles, or add an optional third (sold separately) for enhanced versatility in a wide range of demands. Reinforced guy points with cord-stowing pockets, 7 aluminum Groung Hog(TM) stakes and cord tensioners and reflective guy cord.
short_description: The MSR Zing shelter is ideal for multi-night basecamp endeavors and sleeps 6 - 12 adults. It easily covers a large picnic-table-size area to shield you from sun, rain and even wind.
